query:
UPDATE invoices SET clientSlug = 'igl-coatings-africa' WHERE invoiceNumber = 'IGL002';

INSERT INTO invoices (invoiceNumber, clientSlug, clientName, clientContact, clientPhone, projectName, projectSummary, invoiceType, status, subtotal, discountPercent, discountAmount, totalAmount, amountDue, paymentTerms, paymentReference, paymentUrl, bankName, accountHolder, accountNumber, accountType, branchCode, notes, invoiceDate)
VALUES (
  'IGL-M001',
  'igl-coatings-africa',
  'IGL Coatings Africa',
  'Terrence Geoghegan',
  '082 331 6651',
  'iglcoatings.africa Monthly Services',
  'Monthly operational services for the iglcoatings.africa website, including hosting and optional add-on services to ensure optimal performance, security, and lead generation.',
  'monthly',
  'sent',
  1498.00,
  0,
  0,
  1498.00,
  1498.00,
  'Monthly recurring — card details required via PayFast',
  'IGLCAFRICA-MONTHLY',
  NULL,
  'FNB/RMB',
  'Gro Digital',
  '62842244725',
  'Gold Business Account',
  '250655',
  'This is a monthly recurring subscription. Click the PayFast button to set up your card for automatic monthly payments. You may also pay via EFT using the banking details provided.',
  '2026-02-20 00:00:00'
);

INSERT INTO invoices (invoiceNumber, clientSlug, clientName, clientContact, clientPhone, projectName, projectSummary, invoiceType, status, subtotal, discountPercent, discountAmount, totalAmount, amountDue, paymentTerms, paymentReference, paymentUrl, bankName, accountHolder, accountNumber, accountType, branchCode, notes, invoiceDate)
VALUES (
  'IGL-A001',
  'igl-coatings-africa',
  'IGL Coatings Africa',
  'Terrence Geoghegan',
  '082 331 6651',
  'iglcoatings.africa Annual Services',
  'Annual domain renewal for the iglcoatings.africa website, ensuring continued ownership and availability of the domain name.',
  'annual',
  'sent',
  299.00,
  0,
  0,
  299.00,
  299.00,
  'Annual recurring — card details required via PayFast',
  'IGLCAFRICA-ANNUAL',
  NULL,
  'FNB/RMB',
  'Gro Digital',
  '62842244725',
  'Gold Business Account',
  '250655',
  'This is an annual recurring subscription for domain renewal. Click the PayFast button to set up your card for automatic annual payments. You may also pay via EFT using the banking details provided.',
  '2026-02-20 00:00:00'
);

INSERT INTO invoiceItems (invoiceId, description, frequency, vat, unitPrice, quantity, lineTotal, sortOrder)
SELECT id, 'Website Hosting', 'Monthly', 'No VAT', 149.00, 1, 149.00, 1 FROM invoices WHERE invoiceNumber = 'IGL-M001'
UNION ALL
SELECT id, 'Maintenance Retainer', 'Monthly', 'No VAT', 750.00, 1, 750.00, 2 FROM invoices WHERE invoiceNumber = 'IGL-M001'
UNION ALL
SELECT id, 'Security Protection', 'Monthly', 'No VAT', 249.00, 1, 249.00, 3 FROM invoices WHERE invoiceNumber = 'IGL-M001'
UNION ALL
SELECT id, 'Chat & Lead Capture Bot', 'Monthly', 'No VAT', 350.00, 1, 350.00, 4 FROM invoices WHERE invoiceNumber = 'IGL-M001';

INSERT INTO invoiceItems (invoiceId, description, frequency, vat, unitPrice, quantity, lineTotal, sortOrder)
SELECT id, 'Domain Renewal (iglcoatings.africa)', 'Annual', 'No VAT', 299.00, 1, 299.00, 1 FROM invoices WHERE invoiceNumber = 'IGL-A001';
